StringTable.Label: EXP4M4CampaignTerranCrusader_Name
StringTable.String: T.A.S. Crusader

StringTable.Label: EXP4M4CampaignTerranCrusader_Dec
StringTable.String: The Flag ship of the Terran 1st Fleet, and the most powerful ship ever created by the Terran Alliance

StringTable.Label: EXP4CampaignTerranCruiser_Name
StringTable.String: T.A.S. Cruiser

StringTable.Label: EXP4CampaignTerranCruiser_Dec
StringTable.String: Large beam-combat platform capable of filling space with deadly, glittering colors.

StringTable.Label: EXP4CampaignTerranCruiserD_Name
StringTable.String: T.A.S. Cruiser D

StringTable.Label: EXP4CampaignTerranCruiserD_Dec
StringTable.String: Large beam-combat platform capable of filling space with deadly, glittering colors.

StringTable.Label: EXP4CampaignTerranPaladin_Name
StringTable.String: T.A.S. Battle Hammer

StringTable.Label: EXP4CampaignTerranPaladin_Dec
StringTable.String: Medium size combat ship of balanced capabilities. Could form the backbone of any fleet.

StringTable.Label: EXP4CampaignTerranPaladinD_Name
StringTable.String: T.A.S. Battle Hammer D

StringTable.Label: EXP4CampaignTerranPaladinD_Dec
StringTable.String: Medium size combat ship of balanced capabilities. Could form the backbone of any fleet.

StringTable.Label: EXP4CampaignTerranFury_Name
StringTable.String: T.A.S. Fury

StringTable.Label: EXP4CampaignTerranFury_Dec
StringTable.String: Medium range ship, capable of all forms of combat, though excelling at none. Still pretty tough though.

StringTable.Label: EXP4CampaignTerranFuryD_Name
StringTable.String: T.A.S. Fury D

StringTable.Label: EXP4CampaignTerranFuryD_Dec
StringTable.String: Medium range ship, capable of all forms of combat, though excelling at none. Still pretty tough though.

StringTable.Label: EXP4CampaignTerranKnight_Name
StringTable.String: T.A.S. Knight

StringTable.Label: EXP4CampaignTerranKnight_Dec
StringTable.String: Short range combat vessel. It's versatile, with all the pros and cons that implies.

StringTable.Label: EXP4CampaignTerranKnightD_Name
StringTable.String: T.A.S. Knight D

StringTable.Label: EXP4CampaignTerranKnightD_Dec
StringTable.String: Short range combat vessel. It's versatile, with all the pros and cons that implies.

StringTable.Label: EXP4CampaignDrenginDreadnought_Name
StringTable.String: D.E.S. Skullcrusher

StringTable.Label: EXP4CampaignDrenginDreadnought_Dec
StringTable.String: Gigantic vessel designed for kinetic warfare. Will lower property values anywhere it shows up.

StringTable.Label: EXP4CampaignDrenginDreadnoughtD_Name
StringTable.String: D.E.S. Skullcrusher D

StringTable.Label: EXP4CampaignDrenginDreadnoughtD_Dec
StringTable.String: Gigantic vessel designed for kinetic warfare. Will lower property values anywhere it shows up.

StringTable.Label: EXP4CampaignDrenginBattleship_Name
StringTable.String: D.E.S. Dominator

StringTable.Label: EXP4CampaignDrenginBattleship_Dec
StringTable.String: Large kinetic-combat platform, capable of delivering massive amounts of kinetic energy to things it doesn't like.

StringTable.Label: EXP4CampaignDrenginBattleshipD_Name
StringTable.String: D.E.S. Dominator D

StringTable.Label: EXP4CampaignDrenginBattleshipD_Dec
StringTable.String: Large kinetic-combat platform, capable of delivering massive amounts of kinetic energy to things it doesn't like.

StringTable.Label: EXP4CampaignDrenginFrigate_Name
StringTable.String: D.E.S. Torturer

StringTable.Label: EXP4CampaignDrenginFrigate_Dec
StringTable.String: Medium size kinetic-warfare ship. The larger the slug-thrower, the larger the slugs.

StringTable.Label: EXP4CampaignDrenginFrigateD_Name
StringTable.String: D.E.S. Torturer D

StringTable.Label: EXP4CampaignDrenginFrigateD_Dec
StringTable.String: Medium size kinetic-warfare ship. The larger the slug-thrower, the larger the slugs.

StringTable.Label: EXP4CampaignDrenginGunboat_Name
StringTable.String: D.E.S. Xa'Tala

StringTable.Label: EXP4CampaignDrenginGunboat_Dec
StringTable.String: Mid range shootist, arrayed with kinetic weapons and armor. A mean, mean ship.

StringTable.Label: EXP4CampaignDrenginGunboatD_Name
StringTable.String: D.E.S. Xa'Tala D

StringTable.Label: EXP4CampaignDrenginGunboatD_Dec
StringTable.String: Mid range shootist, arrayed with kinetic weapons and armor. A mean, mean ship.

StringTable.Label: EXP3CampaginAwardThalanLarge_Name
StringTable.String: Prophecy

StringTable.Label: EXP3CampaginAwardThalanLarge_Dec
StringTable.String: Large combat vessel, versatile in nature. For the indecisive who still wants a nice big stick.

StringTable.Label: EXP4M1CampaignCorvette_Name
StringTable.String: T.A.S. Furan

StringTable.Label: EXP4M1CampaignCorvette_Dec
StringTable.String: Medium size beam-warfare ship. If you need a lot of things burnt very quickly, this is your ship.

StringTable.Label: EXP4M1CampaignFrigate_Name
StringTable.String: T.A.S. Tom Chick

StringTable.Label: EXP4M1CampaignFrigate_Dec
StringTable.String: Medium size kinetic-warfare ship. The larger the slug-thrower, the larger the slugs.

StringTable.Label: EXP4M1CampaignGuardian_Name
StringTable.String: T.A.S. Guardian

StringTable.Label: EXP4M1CampaignGuardian_Dec
StringTable.String: Short range, optimized for kinetic combat. An ornery little stone thrower.

StringTable.Label: EXP4CampaignValkrie_Name
StringTable.String: T.A.S. Valkrie

StringTable.Label: EXP4CampaignValkrie_Dec
StringTable.String: Large beam-combat platform capable of filling space with deadly, glittering colors.

StringTable.Label: EXP4CampaignRanger_Name
StringTable.String: T.A.S. Ranger

StringTable.Label: EXP4CampaignRanger_Dec
StringTable.String: Medium size missile-warfare ship. Can put a lot of missiles into space very quickly.

StringTable.Label: EXP4CampaignDestroyer_Name
StringTable.String: T.A.S. Destroyer

StringTable.Label: EXP4CampaignDestroyer_Dec
StringTable.String: Large missile-combat platform capable of spewing forth clouds of deadly missiles.

StringTable.Label: EXP4CampaignAltarianOverlord_Name
StringTable.String: A.R.S. Last Hope

StringTable.Label: EXP4CampaignAltarianOverlord_Dec
StringTable.String: Large beam-combat platform capable of filling space with deadly, glittering colors.

StringTable.Label: EXP4M4CampaignDefenseThalanAvatar_Name
StringTable.String: T.C.S. Ambassador

StringTable.Label: EXP4M4CampaignDefenseThalanAvatar_Dec
StringTable.String: Enormous vessel designed for beam combat. Doesn't play nice with others.

StringTable.Label: EXP4M1CampaignTransport_Name
StringTable.String: T.A.S. Invader

StringTable.Label: EXP4M1CampaignTransport_Dec
StringTable.String: Large but fragile ship, packed with troops and vehicles, built to invade unfriendly planets.
